name: The Grass Is Greener
summary_text: Victor and Hilary have guided tours in their English mansion. A US oil tycoon "bumps" into Hilary during a tour and charms his way into her heart. Meanwhile, Hattie pursues Victor.

name: The Bay
summary_text: Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.

name: Red Shoe Diaries
summary_text: Jake yearns to understand the secret life of his late fiancee. To find the answer, he solicits the most heartfelt, passionate, and intimate entries in other women's diaries. These are their stories...

name: The Homesman
summary_text: Three women who have been driven mad by pioneer life are to be transported across the country by covered wagon by the pious, independent-minded Mary Bee Cuddy, who in turn employs low-life drifter George Briggs to assist her.

name: The Shootist
summary_text: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

name: The Good Life
summary_text: The perils of "escaping the rat race" and dropping out of society - to start a farm in Surbiton (and to drive Margo nuts).

name: Upright
summary_text: Two misfits, thrown together by chance in the middle of the Australian desert, forge bonds in a quest to transport a precious piano from one side of the country to the other.

name: The Souvenir
summary_text: A young film student in the early '80s becomes romantically involved with a complicated and untrustworthy man.

name: Aniara
summary_text: A spaceship carrying settlers to Mars is knocked off course, causing the consumption-obsessed passengers to consider their place in the universe.

name: WWE Raw
summary_text: The superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment's "RAW" brand collide each and every week on WWE Monday Night.

name: The Legend of Hercules
summary_text: The origin story of the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

name: Moby Dick
summary_text: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

name: Save Yourselves!
summary_text: A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

name: Wait Until Dark
summary_text: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

name: The Thomas Crown Affair
summary_text: A debonair, adventuresome bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect multi-million dollar heist, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator who will do anything to get her man.

name: Welcome to Utmark
summary_text: In a small remote Norwegian town live: a corrupt sheriff, an alcoholic shepherd, a nature-loving bootlegger, a God-hating pastor and a grieving pimp.

name: The Expendables 4
summary_text: The plot is unknown.

name: He Ran All the Way
summary_text: Nick and his partner Al stage a payroll holdup. Al is shot and Nick kills a policeman. Nick hides out at a public pool, where he meets Peg Dobbs. They go back to her apartment and he forces her family to hide him from the police manhunt.

name: Bound
summary_text: The daughter of a wealthy real estate broker falls in love with a younger man, who introduces her to B&D and S&M. Using her newly awakened sexual prowess, she finally takes charge of her own life.

name: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
summary_text: In New York City, an estranged couple who witness a murder are relocated to small town Wyoming as part of the Witness Protection Program.

name: Mystery Science Theater 3000
summary_text: In the not-too-distant future Joel Robinson is held captive by Dr. Forrester and TV's Frank, forced to watch B-Grade movies on the Satellite of Love with the help of his robot friends: Cambot, Gypsy, Tom Servo and Crow T. Robot.

name: The Joy Luck Club
summary_text: The life histories of four East Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

name: Dog
summary_text: Briggs who, alongside his companion Lulu, a Belgian Malinois haul ass down the Pacific Coast in time to catch their best friend's and handler's funeral. One of them has a week to live, the other lives like every day is his last.

name: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
summary_text: Two friends, Simon and Kamina, become the symbols of rebellion against the powerful Spiral King, who forced mankind into subterranean villages.

name: The Professionals
summary_text: Bodie and Doyle, top agents for Britain's CI5 (Criminal Intelligence 5), and their controller, George Cowley fight terrorism and similar high-profile crimes. Cowley, a hard ex-MI5 operative...                See full summary »

name: Stand and Deliver
summary_text: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout-prone students to learn calculus.

name: The Wiz
summary_text: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

name: The Rookie
summary_text: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

name: Phantom of the Paradise
summary_text: A disfigured composer sells his soul for the woman he loves so that she will perform his music. However, an evil record tycoon betrays him and steals his music to open his rock palace, The Paradise.

name: Edge of Darkness
summary_text: As homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates the murder of his activist daughter, he uncovers a corporate cover-up and government conspiracy that attracts an agent tasked with cleaning up the evidence.

name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
summary_text: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.

name: 25th Hour
summary_text: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

name: Bambi
summary_text: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

name: Intelligence
summary_text: Organized crime and the Organized Crime Unit (OCU) work together to achieve the opposing goals of each respective world.

name: Wash Me in the River
summary_text: A recovering opioid addict seeks revenge on the dealers responsible for selling the drugs that resulted in his fiance's death.

name: Derek
summary_text: Derek is a loyal nursing home care assistant who sees only the good in his quirky co-workers as they struggle against prejudice and shrinking budgets to care for their elderly residents.

name: Rollerball
summary_text: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

name: Bratz
summary_text: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body President, who wants to split them up into different social cliques.

name: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
summary_text: Inspired by fairytales such as Alice in Wonderland and Little Red Riding Hood, is a surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world.

name: Frayed
summary_text: A wealthy London housewife is forced to return to her hometown in Australia, where she's forced to confront her past and the reasons that caused her to leave years ago.

name: Astro Boy
summary_text: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

name: Massacre in Dinosaur Valley
summary_text: A small plane carrying fossil hunters crashes in the Amazon jungle, and the survivors must battle their way through cannibals, wild animals, and slave traders.

name: Earwig and the Witch
summary_text: An orphan girl, Earwig, is adopted by a witch and comes home to a spooky house filled with mystery and magic.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Tales of the Code: Wedlocked
summary_text: In this short prequel to the first Pirates of the Caribbean movie, two feisty brides-to-be discover that they have something in common - the absent groom. Still, there are plenty of pirates who'd love to trade their goats for 'em.

name: Inspector Gadget
summary_text: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

name: Cadaver
summary_text: In the starving aftermath of a nuclear disaster, a family of three attends a charitable event at a hotel, which takes a dark turn when people start to disappear.

name: She's Funny That Way
summary_text: On the set of a playwright's new project, a love triangle forms between his wife, her ex-lover, and the call girl-turned-actress cast in the production.

name: Tiger King
summary_text: A rivalry between big cat eccentrics takes a dark turn when Joe Exotic, a controversial animal park boss, is caught in a murder-for-hire plot.

name: Ramprasad Ki Tehrvi
summary_text: Bauji's entire family comes under one roof for 13 days after he passes away. We get a glimpse of their dynamics, politics and insecurities as each one of them is on their journey to discover their own selves and truth.

name: Best in Sex: 2020 AVN Awards
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: Sniper: Ultimate Kill
summary_text: For the first time, Brandon Beckett, Richard Miller and Sgt. Thomas Beckett join forces in Colombia to take down a brutal drug cartel.

name: Baba Yaga
summary_text: An original interpretation of Baba Yaga's story that goes beyond the traditional image of this character. What led the young sorceress Yadviga to turn into the recluse Yaga, living on a ...                See full summary »

name: The Hating Game
summary_text: Resolving to achieve professional success without compromising her ethics, Lucy embarks on a ruthless game of one-upmanship against cold and efficient nemesis Joshua, a rivalry that is complicated by her growing attraction to him.

name: Tru Calling
summary_text: A university graduate working in the city morgue is able to repeat the same day over again to prevent murders or other disasters.

name: Overdrive
summary_text: Two car thief brothers, who journey to the south of France for new opportunities, wind up in the cross hairs of the local crime boss.

name: The Incredible Dr. Pol
summary_text: With more than 20,000 patients, Dr. Pol has seen it all. Specializing in large farm animals, this senior is anything but retiring as he takes an old school, no-nonsense approach to veterinary medicine.

name: Day of the Dead: Bloodline
summary_text: A small group of military personnel and survivalists dwell in an underground bunker as they seek to find a cure in a world overrun by zombies.

name: The Reef
summary_text: A great white shark hunts the crew of a capsized sailboat along the Great Barrier Reef.

name: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
summary_text: When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

name: In the Name of God
summary_text: Love, Lust, Freedom, Greed, Beauty what drives people to do unimaginable things? What provokes them to shed Blood? Press the play button for a shocking tale.

name: Galavant
summary_text: A musical comedy adventure featuring a knight on a quest for love who helps a childish king to see the error of his ways.

name: A Woman Under the Influence
summary_text: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

name: Embrace of the Vampire
summary_text: An 18-year-old college freshman is seduced by a handsome vampire lover who introduces her to a dark world of carnal desires.

name: To the Manor Born
summary_text: Audrey fforbes-Hamilton is sad when her husband dies but is shocked when she realises that she has to leave Grantleigh Manor where her family has lived forever. The new owner is Richard De ...                See full summary »

name: Holy Smoke
summary_text: Ruth's been brainwashed by a guru in Delhi, India. Her parents in Sydney hire a specialist in reversing this. Ruth is tricked to return to Australia and is isolated in an outback cabin with the specialist. It gets messy.

name: Boys Over Flowers
summary_text: Poor girl attends the elite Shin Hwa High and is bullied by the leader of F4 (the four richest boys). He becomes attracted to her; however, she has a crush on his best friend. Whom will she choose?

name: Wildfire
summary_text: A young woman finds excitement and romance at a horse ranch she works at as part of her parole from juvenile hall.

name: Meet Me in St. Louis
summary_text: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

name: The Naked Truth
summary_text: A respected photojournalist loses everything and ends up taking a job at a sleazy celebrity tabloid.

name: Heaven's Gate
summary_text: During the Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, a sheriff born into wealth does his best to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

name: Hoodwinked!
summary_text: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

name: North Country
summary_text: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States, Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.

name: The Way of the Dragon
summary_text: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

name: Aunty Donna's Big Ol' House of Fun
summary_text: In their new sketch series, Aunty Donna's Big Ol' House of Fun take viewers along for an absurdist adventure through their everyday lives.

name: Peacemaker
summary_text: The origin of the DC superhero so dedicated to world peace that he is prepared to use force of arms to achieve it.

name: Pixie
summary_text: To avenge her mother's death, Pixie masterminds a heist but must flee across Ireland from gangsters, take on the patriarchy, and choose her own destiny.

name: Invincible
summary_text: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

name: Little Big Man
summary_text: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

name: The Entity
summary_text: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

name: Soul Survivors
summary_text: A college student is caught between the world of the living and the dead.

name: El Cid
summary_text: The story of Rodrigo Díaz de Vivar, a Castilian nobleman and war hero in medieval Spain.

name: The Zero Theorem
summary_text: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves.

name: Nude Interviews
summary_text: In each episode, a Nude-Muse model is interviewed while completely nude.

name: Bugsy Malone
summary_text: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

name: How to Build a Girl
summary_text: A teenager living with her working-class family on a council estate in Wolverhampton, England, grows up to become a popular but conflicted music journalist.

name: Summer Lovers
summary_text: A young American couple and a French woman engage in a threesome in the Greek Islands.

name: Ikiru
summary_text: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

name: High and Low
summary_text: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

name: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
summary_text: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

name: Serving Sara
summary_text: A process server tries to serve an elusive female target.

name: In the Electric Mist
summary_text: A detective in post-Katrina New Orleans has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of ghostly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching, and corrupt local businessmen.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
summary_text: A Heffley family road trip to attend Meemaw's 90th birthday party goes hilariously off course thanks to Greg's newest scheme to get to a video gaming convention.

name: Shallow Grave
summary_text: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

name: Exterminate All the Brutes
summary_text: The path to the new world, an unsettling and intricate story of genocides. Conquest, slavery and the fabrication of "Whiteness".

name: All Good Things
summary_text: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.

name: The Late Bloomer
summary_text: The story of an adult male who, after the successful removal of a benign tumor resting against his pituitary gland, experiences all the changes and effects of puberty over a three-week period.

name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
summary_text: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

name: The Girl Who Played with Fire
summary_text: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

name: The Legend of 1900
summary_text: A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

name: Cult of Chucky
summary_text: Chucky returns to terrorize his human victim, Nica. Meanwhile, the killer doll has some scores to settle with his old enemies, with the help of his former wife.

name: The NeverEnding Story II: The Next Chapter
summary_text: A young boy with a distant father enters a world of make-believe and magic through a portal within an antique book.

name: Wallflower
summary_text: Joy (Janis Paige) is used to getting male attention, while her step-sister, Jackie (Joyce Reynolds), stands on the sidelines. The pair, who have a strong bond, come home from college and ...                See full summary »

name: Men in Kilts: A Roadtrip with Sam and Graham
summary_text: Sam Heughan and Graham McTavish take viewers on a road-trip, discovering the rich and complex heritage of their native Scotland.

name: Devdas
summary_text: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

name: Like Crazy
summary_text: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

name: Hi-de-Hi!
summary_text: Comic goings on in this series set in an English holiday camp called Maplins. The title comes from the camp's greeting, which the staff are meant to say with enthusiasm but all too often ...                See full summary »
The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth century Italy, as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

name: Selling Sunset
summary_text: The elite real estate brokers at The Oppenheim Group sell the luxe life to affluent buyers in LA. The drama ramps up when a new agent joins the team.

name: Meet Dave
summary_text: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

name: Interrogation
summary_text: A non-linear crime series that is centered around an interrogation of people who might be involved in a decades-old murder case.

name: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married?
summary_text: The big screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

name: An American Tail
summary_text: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

name: Darkness Falls
summary_text: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

name: A Glitch in the Matrix
summary_text: Documentary filmmaker Rodney Ascher tackles this question "are we living in a simulation?" with testimony, philosophical evidence and scientific explanation in his for the answer.

name: The Invasion
summary_text: As a Washington, D.C. psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.

name: A Mighty Wind
summary_text: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

name: Children of Heaven
summary_text: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

name: Extant
summary_text: An astronaut struggles to learn how she became pregnant while on a thirteen-month-long solo space mission.

name: Sator
summary_text: Secluded in a desolate forest, a broken family is observed by Sator, a supernatural entity who is attempting to claim them.

name: The Last Exorcism
summary_text: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

name: Knight Rider
summary_text: A former Army Ranger, an FBI agent and a young woman search for the culprits who want the crime-fighting car KITT.

name: The Wrecking Crew
summary_text: Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.

name: Helix
summary_text: A team of scientists are thrust into a potentially life-or-death situation when they arrive in the Arctic to secretly investigate what could be an outbreak of a strange disease in a secluded international research facility.

name: Swedish Dicks
summary_text: Two unlicensed Swedish private investigators try to make a living in Los Angeles.

name: Heist
summary_text: A father is without the means to pay for his daughter's medical treatment. As a last resort, he partners with a greedy co-worker to rob a casino. When things go awry they're forced to hijack a city bus.

name: Under Suspicion
summary_text: A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.

name: Casualties of War
summary_text: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

name: Tale of Tales
summary_text: From the bitter quest of the Queen of Longtrellis, to two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king, to the King of Highhills obsessed with a giant Flea, these tales are inspired by the fairytales by Giambattista Basile.

name: Lemonade Mouth
summary_text: Five high school kids, Olivia, Wendall, Stella, Charlie, and Mo, meet in detention and start a band based on the lemonade vending machine outside the detention room.

name: Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
summary_text: Two female friends become sexual rivals at maturity.

name: The Mothman Prophecies
summary_text: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

name: Alex Cross
summary_text: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.

name: Hudson Hawk
summary_text: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

name: Dark Crimes
summary_text: A murder investigation of a slain businessman turns to clues found in an author's book about an eerily similar crime. Based on the 2008 article "True Crimes - A Postmodern Murder Mystery" by David Grann.

name: Big Bad Mama
summary_text: A tough single mother and her two daughters are forced by circumstances into a life of crime, and quickly become outlaws on the run, picking up partners along the way, and traveling to different states, pursued by the law.

name: Stigmata
summary_text: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.

name: The Resort
summary_text: Four friends head to Hawaii to investigate reports of a haunting at an abandoned resort in hopes of finding the infamous Half-Faced Girl. When they arrive, they soon learn you should be careful what you wish for.

name: Corpus Christi
summary_text: Daniel experiences a spiritual transformation in a detention center. Although his criminal record prevents him from applying to the seminary, he has no intention of giving up his dream and decides to minister a small-town parish.

name: Firestarter
summary_text: A young girl tries to understand how she mysteriously gained the power to set things on fire with her mind.

name: Ride Beyond Vengeance
summary_text: After an 11-year absence, a buffalo hunter returns home with lots of money in his saddlebags only to be robbed at gunpoint by a trio of no-good town citizens, prompting an eventual revenge quest.

name: Stitchers
summary_text: A young woman is recruited into a secret government agency to be "stitched" into the minds of the recently deceased, using their memories to investigate murders.

name: Old Yeller
summary_text: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

name: The Daily Life of the Immortal King
summary_text: Wang Ling is a near-invincible existence with powers far beyond his control. But now that he's sixteen, he faces his greatest battle yet - Senior High School.

name: The Garden of Words
summary_text: A 15-year-old boy and 27-year-old woman find an unlikely friendship one rainy day in the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.

name: Tommy
summary_text: A psychosomatically deaf, dumb and blind boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.

name: Contempt
summary_text: Screenwriter Paul Javal's marriage to his wife Camille disintegrates during movie production as she spends time with the producer. Layered conflicts between art and business ensue.

name: Fourteen Hours
summary_text: An unhappy man threatens suicide by standing on the ledge of a high-rise building for 14 hours.

name: Blade
summary_text: Plot is unknown at this time.

name: Two Weeks to Live
summary_text: A woman sets out on a secret mission to honour her father, who died under mysterious circumstances when she was a young girl.

name: The First Lady
summary_text: In the East Wing of the White House, many of history's most impactful and world-changing decisions have been hidden from view, made by America's charismatic, complex and dynamic first ladies.

name: Jungle 2 Jungle
summary_text: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

name: The Wandering Earth
summary_text: As the sun is dying out, people all around the world build giant planet thrusters to move Earth out of its orbit and sail Earth to a new star system. Yet the 2500-year journey comes with unexpected dangers, and in order to save humanity, a group of young people in this age of a wandering Earth fight hard for the survival of humankind.

name: Ingobernable
summary_text: The first lady of Mexico is a woman of conviction and ideals. But when she loses faith in her husband, she'll need all her strength to uncover the truth.

name: Kingdom Hearts III
summary_text: Believing light and darkness must remain in balance, Master Xehanort seeks to spark war against the "tyranny of light" to restore equilibrium.

name: Cutthroat Island
summary_text: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

name: The Hitcher
summary_text: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

name: Man of the House
summary_text: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

name: Running Scared
summary_text: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.

name: The Descent: Part 2
summary_text: Refusing to believe her story about cave-dwelling monsters, the sole survivor of a spelunking exploration gone horribly wrong is forced to follow the authorities back into the caves where something awaits.

name: Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore
summary_text: A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.

name: Stronger
summary_text: Stronger is the inspiring real life story of Jeff Bauman, an ordinary man who captured the hearts of his city and the world to become a symbol of hope after surviving the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing.

name: Teen Spirit
summary_text: Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. Driven by a pop-fueled soundtrack, Teen Spirit is a visceral and stylish spin on the Cinderella story.

name: The Family Stone
summary_text: An uptight, conservative businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

name: Bad Day for the Cut
summary_text: A middle-aged Irish farmer, who still lives at home with his mother, sets off on a mission of revenge when his mother is murdered.

name: True to the Game 2
summary_text: After her friend's death, a NYC journalist becomes the target of a criminal looking to collect on a debt.

name: Cinderella
summary_text: Although mistreated by her cruel stepmother and stepsisters, Cinderella is able to attend the royal ball through the help of a fairy godmother.

name: LelleBelle
summary_text: 19-year old Belle practices playing the violin diligently, but is unable to impart her music with a sensitive undertone. Her life changes when she discovers that sexual desire stimulates passion in her music.

name: The Undertaker and His Pals
summary_text: An undertaker and his two friends, who are restaurant owners, drum up business by going out on the town and killing people; the restaurant owners use parts of the bodies for their menu, and...                See full summary »

name: Thinner
summary_text: An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.

name: Sol Yanim
summary_text: The drama series follows the story of a mother and her young daughter, Serra, as they try to get used to their new life in an ordinary neighborhood after falling from grace.

name: Good Behavior
summary_text: Letty Raines is a thief and con artist whose life is always one wrong turn, one bad decision, from implosion. Which is just how she likes it.

name: Web Therapy
summary_text: After quitting her job in finance under dubious circumstances, the affluent and self-interested Fiona Wallice tries her hand at therapy - offering clients 3-minute sessions over the Internet in hopes of weeding out any unnecessary emotion.

name: Piranha
summary_text: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

name: Okkupert
summary_text: In the near future, Norway is occupied by Russia on behalf of the European Union, due to the fact that the newly elected environmental friendly Norwegian government has stopped the all important oil- and gas-production in the North Sea.

name: Animaniacs
summary_text: An updated version of the 1990s animated series featuring a trio of wacky characters causing mayhem on the Warner Bros. studio lot.

name: Untitled: The Walking Dead Movie
summary_text: Follows Rick Grimes from the departure of his final season in the TV series.

name: Wilde
summary_text: The turmoil in poet/playwright Oscar Wilde's life after he discovers his homosexuality.

name: Equinox
summary_text: Astrid was traumatized by the mysterious disappearance of a school class in 1999. Twenty years later, when she finds out that the only survivor from 1999 mysteriously died, Astrid sets off to discover what really happened.

name: S.O.B.
summary_text: A movie producer who made a huge flop tries to salvage his career by revamping his film as an erotic production, where its family-friendly star takes her top off.

name: It Takes Two
summary_text: Embark on the craziest journey of your life in It Takes Two, a genre-bending platform adventure created purely for co-op. Invite a friend to join for free with Friend's Pass and work ...                See full summary »

name: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye
summary_text: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye follows the adventures of Sue Thomas at the FBI in Washington, D.C.

name: Station Eleven
summary_text: Survivors of a devastating flu pandemic try to rebuild their lives after losing everything.

name: Phenomena
summary_text: A young girl, with an amazing ability to communicate with insects, is transferred to an exclusive Swiss boarding school, where her unusual capability might help solve a string of murders.

name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
summary_text: A tale of innocent American tourists in Morocco whose son's kidnapping sets off a twisting plot of international intrigue.

name: Monster Trucks
summary_text: A young man working at a small town junkyard discovers and befriends a creature which feeds on oil being sought by a fracking company.

name: Grace and Grit
summary_text: Treya and Ken Wilber's story of courage, transcendence, and eternal love as chronicled in the globally acclaimed book, Grace and Grit.

name: Zenimation
summary_text: An animated soundscape experience of short films that pays tribute to the visual and sound artists of Walt Disney Animation Studios.

name: Twin Peaks: The Missing Pieces
summary_text: Twin Peaks before Twin Peaks (1990) and at the same time not always and entirely in the same place as Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992). A feature film which presents deleted scenes from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992) assembled together for the first time in an untold portion of the story's prequel.

name: Speechless
summary_text: The family of a special-needs teen is good at dealing with the challenges he faces - and excellent at creating new ones.

name: When a Stranger Calls
summary_text: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

name: Wonka
summary_text: The story will focus specifically on a young Willy Wonka and how he met the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

name: City Lights
summary_text: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

name: Bubble Boy
summary_text: Bubble Boy's been in a bubble all his life due to no immune system. A cute blonde girl befriends BB. Her boyfriend proposes and BB decides to travel across USA to Niagara Falls to stop the wedding.

name: Gladiator
summary_text: Tommy Riley has moved with his dad to Chicago from a 'nice place'. He keeps to himself, goes to school. However, after a street fight he is noticed and quickly falls into the world of illegal underground boxing - where punches can kill.

name: Land Girls
summary_text: Follow the lives, loves and highs and lows of four members of the Women's Land Army who are working at the Hoxley Estate during World War II.

name: Punisher: War Zone
summary_text: Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

name: Tuck Everlasting
summary_text: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

name: Ahsoka
summary_text: Series centers on the adventures of Ahsoka Tano. A spin-off from 'The Mandalorian'.

name: The Loud House
summary_text: In Nickelodeon's The Loud House Movie, the biggest family on television goes on the biggest Loud family vacation ever. The adventure follows the Loud family to Scotland where they discover that they are descendants of Scottish royalty.

name: Superman: The Animated Series
summary_text: The last son of the planet Krypton protects his adoptive home of Earth as the greatest of the superheroes.

name: K-PAX
summary_text: PROT is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a faraway planet named K-PAX. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.

name: Bones & All
summary_text: Maren Yearly searches for the father she's never met in an attempt to understand why she has the urge to kill and eat the people that love her.

name: Shrek the Musical
summary_text: Make room for ogre-sized family fun as the greatest fairy tale never told comes to life in a whole new way in this breathtaking Broadway musical adaptation of the hit movie Shrek!

name: Fallout 4
summary_text: In the post-apocalyptic Boston, Massachusetts area, you play as the "Sole Survior" of Vault 111, recently revived from centuries of forced cryostasis, determined to find your kidnapped son.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
summary_text: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

name: Pumpkinhead
summary_text: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

name: Their Finest
summary_text: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

name: Cyborg 2: Glass Shadow
summary_text: 2 companies battle for Cyborg domination. One's built a cyborg/Angelina Jolie so human, that they hope, she'll get into the competition's HQ and explode. But she escapes with her human martial arts instructor.

name: The Detour
summary_text: A contemporary father takes his family on a road trip across America, but a set of crazy, unforeseen circumstances causes them to end up on the run from the FBI.

name: Into the Forest
summary_text: After a massive power outage, two sisters learn to survive on their own in their isolated woodland home.

name: Toradora!

summary_text: A beautiful society reporter goes undercover as a stripper to investigate a murderer stalking the girls at the strip club.

name: Lost and Delirious
summary_text: After starting at an upmarket boarding school, a teenage girl forms close friendships with her two older roommates. However, when she discovers that her new friends are lovers she finds herself caught in a complicated situation.

name: Truth or Dare
summary_text: Eight college friends head to a "Haunted Rental" for Halloween. But when they replay the game that made the house infamous, they awaken an evil spirit intent on stealing their souls.

name: Pierrot le Fou
summary_text: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

name: May
summary_text: A socially awkward veterinary assistant with a lazy eye and obsession with perfection descends into depravity after developing a crush on a boy with perfect hands.

name: High Crimes
summary_text: High powered lawyer Claire Kubik finds her world turned upside down when her husband, who she thought was Tom Kubik, is arrested and is revealed to be Ron Chapman. Chapman is on trial for a...                See full summary »

name: Henry V
summary_text: In the midst of the Hundred Years War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

name: Battle of the Bulge
summary_text: A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.

name: Nezha Reborn
summary_text: A normal young deliveryman Li Yunxiang, though coming from the slum area, is living a satisfying life but when the arrogant wealthy son of Boss beats him down, his deep anger turns into a blast of Truth Fire.

name: Freaks
summary_text: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

name: The Hudsucker Proxy
summary_text: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

name: Gracepoint
summary_text: When a young boy is found dead on an idyllic beach, a major police investigation gets underway in the small California seaside town where the tragedy occurred. Soon deemed a homicide, the case sparks a media frenzy, which throws the boy's family into further turmoil and upends the lives of all of the town's residents.

name: Tekken
summary_text: Jin Kazama witnesses the death of his mother Jun by Tekken in the slums known as Anvil. After finding a Tekken ID he decides to seek out vengeance for his mother's death.

name: Wet Hot American Summer: First Day of Camp
summary_text: Follows the counselors and campers on their first day at Camp Firewood in the summer of 1981.

name: F Troop
summary_text: The misadventures of the staff and neighbors of a remote U.S. Army outpost in the Wild West.

name: Tourism Australia: Dundee - The Son of a Legend Returns Home
summary_text: Brian Dundee tries to locate his father, Crocodile Dundee, in the Australian Outback.

name: Like Father
summary_text: After she's left at the altar, a workaholic advertising executive ends up on her Caribbean honeymoon cruise with her estranged father.

name: Sailor Moon
summary_text: A group of schoolgirls discover they are incarnations of super-powered alien princesses, and use their abilities to defend the earth.

name: Morning Glory
summary_text: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

name: sMothered

name: The Bye Bye Man
summary_text: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

summary_text: Foreign mercenary Guido Fawkes, and a group of English Catholic traitors plan to blow up the Palace Of Westminster and kill King James I in the early 17th century.

name: The Queen of Flow
summary_text: A talented young Reggaeton music composer from Medellín, Colombia, gets wrongly imprisoned in New York, USA, with all her music work stolen and her family murdered. Years later, she is back to Medellín, to avenge those who wronged her.

name: Somewhere
summary_text: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

name: Batman: Hush
summary_text: When threads from Batman's past begin to unravel, the race is on for him to crack Hush's deadly game. Strange alliances will form and shattering secrets will be revealed when Hush's silence is finally broken.

name: Hell Comes to Frogtown
summary_text: After a worldwide nuclear war, where 68% of the male population was wiped out and virile men becoming a rarity, Sam Hell, a scavenger and a highly virile man, is assigned to help rescue a group of fertile women kidnapped by humanoid frogs.

name: Desperados
summary_text: A panicked young woman, with her reluctant friends in tow, rushes to Mexico to try and delete a ranting email she sent to her new boyfriend.

name: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
summary_text: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open and shut case.

name: Smallfoot
summary_text: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as "humans" really do exist.

name: Çarpisma
summary_text: It is about life that intersects with the collision of four cars.

name: Better Off Ted
summary_text: In an amoral science-based company, a manager tries to keep control of his scientists while being pressured by his shrewd boss.

name: Bad Taste
summary_text: The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.

name: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works
summary_text: A group of seven mages gets chosen to become masters of seven classes of heroic spirits, in order to fight and win the Holy Grail.

name: The Big Green
summary_text: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texan school, where she coaches the children in soccer, improving their self esteem and leading to unexpected success.

name: Wrecked
summary_text: When a plane crashes on a deserted island on the way to Thailand, the remaining survivors of the crash struggle to get along and heads clash as they have differing views on how to stay alive and how they will get off the island.

name: Domino
summary_text: A recounting of Domino Harvey's life story. The daughter of actor Laurence Harvey turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

name: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain
summary_text: English artist Louis Wain rises to prominence at the end of the 19th century for his surreal cat paintings.

name: The Thirteenth Floor
summary_text: A computer scientist running a virtual reality simulation of 1937 becomes the primary suspect when his colleague and mentor is murdered.
